abstract: Slumping prices for oil, metals and other commodities bring stock market lower as mining and energy company stocks fall.
lead_paragraph: Prices for copper and other commodities were slumping as investors anticipated that the dollar would get even stronger.

headline.main: Market Weighed Down by Weakness in Mining and Energy Stocks
headline.print_headline: Oil and Metals Slide, and Shares Follow Suit

snippet: Prices for copper and other commodities were slumping as investors anticipated that the dollar would get even stronger.
